verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His, <S%G846><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of Moses <S%G3475><s%> Seat <S%G2515><s%> Have Sat Down <S%G2523><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees; <S%G5330><s%>

All Things <S%G3956><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatever <S%G302><s%> They May Tell <S%G2036><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> To Keep, <S%G5083><s%> Keep <S%G5083><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Do. <S%G4160><s%> <S%G2596><s%> But After <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> <S%G846><s%> Their Works <S%G3361><s%> Do Not; <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3004><s%> For They Say <S%G1063><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Not. <S%G4160><s%>

They Bind <S%G1195><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Burdens <S%G5413><s%> Heavy <S%G926><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hard To Bear, <S%G1419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lay Them <S%G2007><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shoulders <S%G5606><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But With <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1147><s%> Their Own Finger <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Will Not <S%G2309><s%> Move <S%G2795><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> And All <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Their Works <S%G846><s%> They Do <S%G4160><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Be Seen <S%G2300><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Men. <S%G444><s%> They Make Broad <S%G4115><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Phylacteries <S%G5440><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Enlarge <S%G3170><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Borders <S%G2899><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> Of Their Garments, <S%G846><s%>

Love <S%G5368><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First Place <S%G4411><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Suppers, <S%G1173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First Seats <S%G4410><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogues, <S%G4864><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salutations <S%G783><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Market Places, <S%G58><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Called <S%G2564><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> , Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> . Rabbi. <S%G4461><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Call <S%G2564><s%> Your Any One <S%G5216><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%> <S%G1520><s%> For One <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father, <S%G5216><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> Be Called <S%G2564><s%> Leaders; <S%G2519><s%> <S%G1520><s%> For One <S%G1063><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Leader, <S%G2519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Servant. <S%G1249><s%>

<S%G3748><s%> And Whosoever <S%G1161><s%> Will Exalt <S%G5312><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Shall Be Humbled; <S%G5013><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> Will Humble <S%G5013><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Shall Be Exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Shut Up <S%G2808><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men; <S%G444><s%> <S%G5210><s%> For Ye <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Not Enter, <S%G1525><s%> Nor Even <S%G3761><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Entering <S%G1525><s%> Do Ye Suffer <S%G863><s%> To Enter. <S%G1525><s%>

<S%G3759><s%> But Woe <S%G1161><s%> , To You, <S%G5213><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> , Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Devour <S%G2719><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Houses <S%G3614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Of Widows, <S%G5503><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As A Pretext <S%G4392><s%> At Great Length <S%G3117><s%> Praying. <S%G4336><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Ye Shall Receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G4053><s%> Judgment. <S%G2917><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Go About <S%G4013><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dry Land <S%G3584><s%> To Make <S%G4160><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Proselyte, <S%G4339><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> He Has Become So, <S%G1096><s%> Ye Make <S%G4160><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Gehenna <S%G1067><s%> Twofold More Than <S%G1362><s%> Yourselves. <S%G5216><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Guides <S%G3595><s%> Blind, <S%G5185><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Swear <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G3485><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> It Is; <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Swear <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gold <S%G5557><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G3485><s%> Is A Debtor. <S%G3784><s%>

Fools <S%G3474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Blind, <S%G5185><s%> <S%G5101><s%> For Which <S%G1063><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> , Is, <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gold, <S%G5557><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Sanctifies <S%G37><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ; Gold? <S%G5557><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> Shall Swear <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar, <S%G2379><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> It Is; <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Swear <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1435><s%> That Is <S%G3588><s%> Upon <S%G1883><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Is A Debtor. <S%G3784><s%>

Fools <S%G3474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Blind, <S%G5185><s%> For <S%G5101><s%> Which Is <S%G1063><s%> Greater, <S%G3173><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gift, <S%G1435><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar <S%G2379><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Sanctifies <S%G37><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ; Gift? <S%G1435><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Swears <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar <S%G2379><s%> Swears <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> That Are <S%G3588><s%> Upon <S%G1883><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Swears <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Swears <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Dwells In <S%G2730><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Swears <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Swears <S%G3660><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> Upon <S%G1883><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Pay Tithes Of <S%G586><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mint <S%G2238><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Anise <S%G432><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cummin, <S%G2951><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Have Left Aside <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weightier Matters <S%G926><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judgment, <S%G2920><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith : <S%G4102><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> It Behoved You <S%G1163><s%> To Do, <S%G4160><s%> And Those <S%G2548><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Be Leaving Aside. <S%G863><s%>

Guides <S%G3595><s%> Blind, <S%G5185><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Filter Out <S%G1368><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gnat, <S%G2971><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Camel <S%G2574><s%> Swallow. <S%G2666><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Cleanse <S%G2511><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Outside <S%G1855><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Dish, <S%G3953><s%> <S%G2081><s%> But Within <S%G1161><s%> They Are Full <S%G1073><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Plunder <S%G724><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Incontinence. <S%G192><s%>

Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> Blind, <S%G5185><s%> Cleanse <S%G2511><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inside <S%G1787><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> , Dish, <S%G3953><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Become <S%G1096><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Outside <S%G1622><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Clean. <S%G2513><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Are Like <S%G3945><s%> Sepulchres <S%G5028><s%> Whited, <S%G2867><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Outwardly <S%G1855><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Appear <S%G5316><s%> Beautiful, <S%G5611><s%> <S%G2081><s%> But Within <S%G1161><s%> Are Full <S%G1073><s%> Of Bones <S%G3747><s%> Of The Dead <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Uncleanness. <S%G167><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Outwardly <S%G1855><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Appear <S%G5316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men <S%G444><s%> Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> <S%G2081><s%> But Within <S%G1161><s%> Full <S%G3324><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> Of Hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lawlessness. <S%G458><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Ye Build <S%G3618><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sepulchres <S%G5028><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Adorn <S%G2885><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tombs <S%G3419><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Righteous, <S%G1342><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> Ye Bear Witness <S%G3140><s%> To Yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Ye Are Of <S%G2075><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Murdered <S%G5407><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets; <S%G4396><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> Fill Ye Up <S%G4137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Measure <S%G3358><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of Your Fathers. <S%G5216><s%>

Serpents, <S%G3789><s%> Offspring <S%G1081><s%> Of Vipers, <S%G2191><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Shall Ye Escape <S%G5343><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Gehenna? <S%G1067><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Send 649 V-PAI-1S To 4314 PREP You 5209 P-2AP Prophets 4396 N-APM And 2532 CONJ Wise Men 4680 A-APM And 2532 CONJ Scribes; 1122 N-APM And Some 2532 CONJ Of 1537 PREP Them 846 P-GPM Ye Will Kill 615 V-FAI-2P And 2532 CONJ Crucify, 4717 V-FAI-2P And Some 2532 CONJ Of 1537 PREP Them 846 P-GPM Ye Will Scourge 3146 V-FAI-2P In 1722 PREP 3588 T-DPF 4864 N-DPF Your Synagogues, 5216 P-2GP And 2532 CONJ Will Persecute 1377 V-FAI-2P From 575 PREP City 4172 N-GSF To 1519 PREP City; 4172 N-ASF

So That <S%G3704><s%> Should Come <S%G2064><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> All The <S%G3956><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of Abel <S%G6><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> To <S%G2193><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Barachiah, <S%G914><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Murdered <S%G5407><s%> Between <S%G3342><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar. <S%G2379><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Shall Come <S%G2240><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> This Generation. <S%G3778><s%>

Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> , Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Killest <S%G615><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stonest <S%G3036><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> , Her, <S%G846><s%> How Often <S%G4212><s%> Would I 2309 V-AAI-1S Have Gathered Together 1996 V-2AAN 3588 T-APN 5043 N-APN 4675 P-2GS Thy Children, 3739 R-ASM In The Way 5158 N-ASM Gathers Together 1996 V-PAI-3S A Hen 3733 N-NSM 3588 T-APN 3556 N-APN Her Brood 1438 F-3GSF Under Her 5259 PREP 3588 T-APF Wings, 4420 N-APF And 2532 CONJ 3756 PRT-N Ye Would Not! 2309 V-AAI-2P
Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Is Left <S%G863><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Your House <S%G5216><s%> Desolate; <S%G2048><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> <S%G1492><s%> ' Shall Ye See <S%G575><s%> Henceforth <S%G737><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> Ye Say, <S%G2036><s%> Blessed Is <S%G2127><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
